1538490.name: Carved Out
1538490.description:
You are an experienced dwarf miner who is desperately looking for a change. One day you set your eyes upon far mountains and saw a business opportunity; Dungeon Tourism! You will create a place for adventurers in front of the far dungeons! You are a highly skilled miner and extremely talented stone carver, who can turn a tiny cave into lively resort.

Reverse Building Experience

You create by removing not building. Planning ahead is required to get rid of excess rock and leaving the intended body. If you remove a mass that is not supposed to be removed, then find a creative way to turn it to your advantage or bear with its consequences!

Procedurally-Generated Mountain

Carved Out presents a mountain, created from procedurally generated non-equal grids which provide unique gaming experiences. Every new turn you will dig, carve and shape a different mountain requiring new solutions.

Know Your Guests

While you are doing your best to create unforgettable experiences for your guests to receive positive reviews, do not forget that adventurers may be from any race, class or background. There is no one-size-fits-all, rather your solutions have to be tailor-made. Try to understand your guests well to choose the most suitable room types for them.
1538490.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
